languages.text: "Если ради этого надо послужить ксеносу... пусть! Все эти дни, что я здесь, я живу в блаженной тишине. Никто не досаждает мне. Никто не мучает меня! Никто не пытается достать меня с той стороны, а с этой... с этой меня просто не замечают! Мне и не надо иного! Пускай... меня все... оставят в покое..." {n}Идира отворачивается — от резкого движения она чуть пошатывается.{/n}

"If it means I have to serve a xenos... so be it! All the days I've been here, I've spent in blissful silence. No one bothers me. No one torments me! No one is trying to get at me from the other side, and on this side... nobody notices me at all! I don't want anything else! I just want... to be left alone..." {n}Idira turns away, teetering slightly from the sharp motion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если ради этого надо послужить ксеносу... пусть! Все эти дни, что я здесь, я живу в блаженной тишине. Никто не досаждает мне. Никто не мучает меня! Никто не пытается достать меня с той стороны, а с этой... с этой меня просто не замечают! Мне и не надо иного! Пускай... меня все... оставят в покое..." {n}Идира отворачивается — от резкого движения она чуть пошатывается.{/n}

No one is trying to get me from the other side, and on this side... nobody notices me at all! I don't want anything else! I just want... to be left alone..." {n}Idira turns away, teetering slightly from the sharp motion.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

No one is trying to get at me from the other side, and on this side... nobody notices me at all! I don't want anything else! I just want... to be left alone..." {n}Idira turns away, teetering slightly from the sharp motion.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「それが異種族に仕えるということなら…仕方ないわ！ここでは至福の沈黙の中で生きてきた。誰にも邪魔されない。誰も私を苦しめない！誰も向こう側から私を捕まえようとはしないし、こちら側では…誰も私にまったく気づかない！私はもう何も望まない！とにかく…放っておいてほしい…」{n}イディラは背を向け、その急な動きにわずかによろめいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it means I have to serve a xenos... so be it! All the days I've been here, I've spent in blissful silence. No one bothers me. No one torments me! No one is trying to get at me from the other side, and on this side... nobody notices me at all! I don't want anything else! I just want... to be left alone..." {n}Idira turns away, teetering slightly from the sharp motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それが異種族に仕えるということなら…仕方ないわ！ここでは至福の沈黙の中で生きてきた。誰にも邪魔されない。誰も私を苦しめない！誰も向こう側から私を捕まえようとはしないし、こちら側では…誰も私にまったく気づかない！私はもう何も望まない！とにかく…放っておいてほしい…」{n}イディラは背を向け、その急な動きにわずかによろめいた。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “就算这意味着我必须侍奉异形……那也无所谓！我这段日子里一直生活在至福的沉默之中。没有声音再打扰我，也没有声音再折磨我！更没有人打算把我拉到另一边去，在这个地方……根本没有人注意到我！我什么都不不想要！我只想……一个人静静地呆着……”{n}伊迪拉转过了身，由于过于激动而微微喘着粗气。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it means I have to serve a xenos... so be it! All the days I've been here, I've spent in blissful silence. No one bothers me. No one torments me! No one is trying to get at me from the other side, and on this side... nobody notices me at all! I don't want anything else! I just want... to be left alone..." {n}Idira turns away, teetering slightly from the sharp motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “就算这意味着我必须侍奉异形……那也无所谓！我这段日子里一直生活在至福的沉默之中。没有声音再打扰我，也没有声音再折磨我！更没有人打算把我拉到另一边去，在这个地方……根本没有人注意到我！我什么都不不想要！我只想……一个人静静地呆着……”{n}伊迪拉转过了身，由于过于激动而微微喘着粗气。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Si eso significa que tengo que servir a un xenos... ¡que así sea! Todos los días que he pasado aquí han estado envueltos en un maravilloso silencio. Nadie me molesta. ¡Nadie me atormenta! Nadie intenta atacarme desde el otro lado, y en este... ¡nadie se fija en mí! ¡Eso es todo lo que quiero! Solo quiero... estar sola...». {n}Idira aparta la mirada y parece marearse un poco por lo repentino del movimiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it means I have to serve a xenos... so be it! All the days I've been here, I've spent in blissful silence. No one bothers me. No one torments me! No one is trying to get at me from the other side, and on this side... nobody notices me at all! I don't want anything else! I just want... to be left alone..." {n}Idira turns away, teetering slightly from the sharp motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si eso significa que tengo que servir a un xenos... ¡que así sea! Todos los días que he pasado aquí han estado envueltos en un maravilloso silencio. Nadie me molesta. ¡Nadie me atormenta! Nadie intenta atacarme desde el otro lado, y en este... ¡nadie se fija en mí! ¡Eso es todo lo que quiero! Solo quiero... estar sola...». {n}Idira aparta la mirada y parece marearse un poco por lo repentino del movimiento.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn ich dafür einem Xenos dienen muss ... dann ist das eben so! All die Tage, die ich hier war, habe ich in glückseliger Stille verbracht. Niemand belästigt mich. Niemand peinigt mich! Niemand von der anderen Seite versucht, mich zu stören, und auf dieser Seite ... bemerkt mich niemand! Mehr will ich gar nicht! Ich will einfach nur ... in Frieden gelassen werden ..." {n}Idira wendet sich ab und kommt durch die abrupte Bewegung leicht ins Taumeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it means I have to serve a xenos... so be it! All the days I've been here, I've spent in blissful silence. No one bothers me. No one torments me! No one is trying to get at me from the other side, and on this side... nobody notices me at all! I don't want anything else! I just want... to be left alone..." {n}Idira turns away, teetering slightly from the sharp motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich dafür einem Xenos dienen muss ... dann ist das eben so! Jeden Tag, den ich hier verbracht habe, habe ich in glückseliger Stille zugebracht. Niemand belästigt mich. Niemand peinigt mich! Niemand von der anderen Seite versucht, mich zu stören, und auf dieser Seite ... bemerkt mich niemand! Mehr will ich gar nicht! Ich will einfach nur ... in Frieden gelassen werden ..." {n}Idira wendet sich ab und kommt durch die abrupte Bewegung leicht ins Taumeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Et si ça implique de servir un xénos... eh bien, tant pis ! Depuis que je suis ici, j'ai droit au silence. Personne ne me harcèle. Personne ne me tourmente ! Personne n'essaie de m'accaparer depuis l'autre côté, et de ce côté-ci... personne ne me remarque ! C'est tout ce dont j'ai toujours rêvé ! Je veux juste... qu'on me laisse tranquille... » {n}Idira se détourne, chancelant sous la force de ses propres émotions.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it means I have to serve a xenos... so be it! All the days I've been here, I've spent in blissful silence. No one bothers me. No one torments me! No one is trying to get at me from the other side, and on this side... nobody notices me at all! I don't want anything else! I just want... to be left alone..." {n}Idira turns away, teetering slightly from the sharp motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et si ça implique de servir un xénos... eh bien, tant pis ! Depuis que je suis ici, j'ai droit au silence. Personne ne me harcèle. Personne ne me tourmente ! Personne n'essaie de m'attraper depuis l'autre côté, et de ce côté-ci... personne ne me remarque ! C'est tout ce dont j'ai toujours rêvé ! Je veux juste... qu'on me laisse tranquille... » {n}Idira se détourne, chancelant sous la force de ses propres émotions.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Bunun karşılığında zenolara hizmet etmem gerekiyorsa... Ederim ben de! Kaç gündür buradayım; sessiz sedasız, huzur içinde yaşadım. Beni ne rahatsız eden var ne de işkence eden! Öteki taraftan bana ulaşmaya çalışan kimse yok, bu taraf desen... Kimse beni fark etmiyor bile! Daha ne isterim? Sadece... Herkes beni yalnız bıraksın istiyorum..." {n}Bir anda hızla arkasını dönen İdira, hafifçe sallanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If it means I have to serve a xenos... so be it! All the days I've been here, I've spent in blissful silence. No one bothers me. No one torments me! No one is trying to get at me from the other side, and on this side... nobody notices me at all! I don't want anything else! I just want... to be left alone..." {n}Idira turns away, teetering slightly from the sharp motion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eğer bunun karşılığında zenolara hizmet etmem gerekiyorsa... Hizmet ederim ben de! Kaç gündür buradayım; ses seda çıkmadan huzur içinde yaşadım. Beni ne rahatsız eden var ne de işkence eden! Öteki taraftan bana ulaşmaya çalışan kimse yok, bu taraf desen... Kimse beni fark etmiyor bile! Bundan başka ne isterim? Sadece... Herkes beni yalnız bıraksın istiyorum..." {n}İdira bir anda hızlıca arkasını dönüp hafifçe sallanıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
